mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHORT_TERM_FORECAST_TB (SHORT_TERM_FORECAST_NO, IDX, SECOND_PRECINCT_NO, FORECAST_DAY, FORECAST_TIME, TMP, PTY, POP, REH, PCP, SKY, WSD, WAV) VALUES (SHORT_TERM_FORECAST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SHORT_TERM_ANNOUNCE_IDX.CURRVAL, #{SECOND_PRECINCT_NO}, #{FORECAST_DAY}, #{FORECAST_TIME}, #{TMP}, #{PTY}, #{POP}, #{REH}, #{PCP}, #{SKY}, #{WSD}, #{WAV})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SHORT_TERM_ANNOUNCE_TB WHERE IDX IN ( SELECT IDX FROM ( SELECT IDX FROM SHORT_TERM_ANNOUNCE_TB ORDER BY IDX ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (SELECT COUNT(*) - 3 FROM SHORT_TERM_ANNOUNCE_TB) )
DELETE FROM SHORT_TERM_ANNOUNCE_TB WHERE IDX IN ( SELECT IDX FROM ( SELECT IDX FROM SHORT_TERM_ANNOUNCE_TB ORDER BY IDX ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= (SELECT COUNT(*) - 3 FROM SHORT_TERM_ANNOUNCE_TB) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEDIUM_TERM_FORECAST_TB (MEDIUM_TERM_FCST_NO, FIRST_PRECINCT_NO, SECOND_PRECINCT_NO, ANNOUNCE_DAY, FORECAST_DAY, WFAM, WFPM, TAMIN, TAMAX, RNSTAM, RNSTPM) VALUES (MEDIUM_TERM_FCST_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{FIRST_PRECINCT_NO},#{SECOND_PRECINCT_NO},#{ANNOUNCE_DAY},#{FORECAST_DAY},NULL,NULL,#{TAMIN},#{TAMAX},0,0)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEDIUM_TERM_FORECAST_TB WHERE (FIRST_PRECINCT_NO, ANNOUNCE_DAY) IN ( SELECT FIRST_PRECINCT_NO, MIN(ANNOUNCE_DAY) FROM ( SELECT FIRST_PRECINCT_NO, ANNOUNCE_DAY, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY FIRST_PRECINCT_NO ORDER BY ANNOUNCE_DAY) as rnk FROM MEDIUM_TERM_FORECAST_TB ) WHERE rnk > 3 GROUP BY FIRST_PRECINCT_NO )
